name: content_repurposing
description: Transform blog content into multiple social media formats. Params: {blog_content}

nodes.instruction:
Analyze this blog post and extract:
1. Main thesis
2. Key points (3-5)
3. Target audience
4. Tone

Blog:
{blog_content}

Create Twitter/X thread (10-15 tweets) based on:
{analyze_blog}

Rules:
- First tweet: hook
- Each tweet max 280 chars
- Use emojis
- End with CTA

Create LinkedIn post based on:
{analyze_blog}

Rules:
- Professional tone
- 1300-2000 chars
- Include 3-5 hashtags
- Add question for engagement
